content:
Barbecue Supply List for 20 People

Meats:

1. Hotdogs - 40 pieces (2 per person)
2. Burgers - 40 patties (2 per person)
3. Steaks - 20 pieces (1 per person)

Buns and Bread:
4. Hotdog buns - 40 pieces

1. Hamburger buns - 40 pieces

Condiments and Toppings:
6. Ketchup

1. Mustard
2. Mayonnaise
3. Relish
4. BBQ sauce
5. Hot sauce (optional)
6. Sliced cheese (for burgers)
7. Lettuce
8. Tomatoes
9. Onions
10. Pickles
11. Jalapenos (optional)

Sides:
18. Potato salad (8 lbs)

1. Coleslaw (8 lbs)
2. Baked beans (8 lbs)
3. Grilled vegetables (e.g., bell peppers, zucchini, mushrooms)
4. Corn on the cob (20 pieces)
5. Chips and dip

Beverages:
24. Water (20 bottles)

1. Soda (assorted, 40 cans)
2. Beer (optional, 24-40 cans or bottles)
3. Iced tea or lemonade (1-2 gallons)

Desserts:
28. Watermelon (2 whole or 1 large)

1. Brownies or cookies (40 pieces)

BBQ Equipment and Supplies:
30. Charcoal or propane (depending on the grill)

1. Lighter fluid (
